sentences.en: a simplified version of the game
an attempt to simplify the tax system
As you create your interfaces, you should constantly be looking to simplify visually.
sentences.cn: 创作界面时, 你必须不断地在视觉方面将其简化.

sentences.en: But the tendency to simplify blinds them to other alternatives.
sentences.cn: 但是这种简化倾向会他们对于其他的可选项视而不见.

sentences.en: For one thing, they simplify the design of a rocket engine.
sentences.cn: 首先, 它们可以简化火箭发动机的设计.

sentences.en: More needs to be done to simplify the process of registering to vote.
sentences.cn: 需要进一步简化投票注册程序。

sentences.en: Recognition of this result enables us to simplify our calculations.
sentences.cn: 意识到这个事实就能简化我们的计算.

sentences.en: Simplify Your Closet: Take all your clothes and putaside.
sentences.cn: 把你所有的衣服搬出来放在一边.

sentences.en: Soft - fit design of 1000 L tips simplify loading and ejecting.
sentences.cn: 1000微升吸头可简化吸液和排液.

sentences.en: The law needs to be simplified.
The subject is immensely complex, and hard to simplify.
sentences.cn: 这个题目非常复杂, 并且很难简化.

sentences.en: The theory be simplify to make it easier to understand.
sentences.cn: 这理论被简化以使其明了易解.

sentences.en: The washing device can simplify a washing process, and has convenient operation.
sentences.cn: 该洗涤装置可使洗涤过程简单, 操作方便.

sentences.en: This algorithm can simplify the data association and has polynomial complexity.
sentences.cn: 该算法采用观测-航迹关联,具有相对简单的多项式复杂度.

sentences.en: This dictionary tries to simplify the meanings of words.
sentences.cn: 这本词典努力把词意简化.

sentences.en: To simplify the interview process, no audio visual aids may be used.
sentences.cn: 为简化程序, 会面期间不可使用任何视听器材.

sentences.en: Try to simplify your explanation for the children.
sentences.cn: 你给孩子们讲解要设法讲得简单明了.

words.tran_cn: 简单地；仅仅；简直；朴素地；坦白地
笨蛋；愚蠢的行为；出身低微者
解释,解决,阐明,扼要,弄清,澄清

trans.tran_en: to make something easier or less complicated
to make something easier or less complicated
